entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
